_main.prompt: Religion general description. With other prominent/notable general details?

History.prompt: What is the History of the Organization? Why was it formed? Is it growing? Any notorious dates or events?

Types and Branches.prompt: Does this Religion have different types? What are them? How are they different? Any moderate/extremist/...?

Views and Beliefs.prompt: Common beliefs? Are they widespread? Are there different interpretations or opinions?

Afterlife, Heaven & Hell.prompt: Is there a belief in afterlife? Heaven? Hell?

Soul.prompt: Is there a belief in souls or alike? What happens to this soul upon death?

Superstitions.prompt: What unnatural force is feared? Believe in Bad Luck/Curses? How are they "cured"?

Genesis & Creation.prompt: What is the creation myth? Is there a belief of the world ending?

Practices and Traditions.prompt: What are some common practices? Are those for everyone? Every time or on occasion?

Burial Rites.prompt: How is the handling of the dead? What rites are performed? Is there special treatment for some individuals?

Symbols.prompt: Any common symbols? What are they and what do they mean/represent?

Texts.prompt: Are there any followed texts? What are they? Are beliefs take from them? Are they followed to the line?

Structure.prompt: What is the Structure of the Organization? How is it divided? Who has power?

Hierarchy.prompt: What is the hierarchy for this religion? Are there different levels and different sizes of places of worship? Is there a centralized individual/group/organization?

Spread and Demographics.prompt: How many followers? Geographic spread. Is it growing in popularity?

Cultural Influence.prompt: How does this religion influence culture? How does it shape art?

Criticism and Persecution.prompt: What opposition has this religion gathered?

Criticism.prompt: What are some criticism to this religion or its beliefs?

Persecution.prompt: Is there persecution of this religion?
